variables.name: azdo_pat
variables.description: String: personal access token for AzDO.
variables.query: What is your Azure DevOps personal access token?

variables.name: azdo_org_name
variables.query: What is your Azure DevOps organization name? (this is the bit after https://dev.azure.com/)

variables.name: location
variables.description: String: Name of Azure region where resources are to be.
variables.query: What Azure region do you want your Azure resources created within?

variables.name: azdo_arm_svc_conn
variables.description: String: Name of AzDO ARM service connection.
variables.query: What is your Azure DevOps service connection name? (it must exist already)

variables.name: azdo_project_name
variables.description: String: Name of AzDO project in the org.
variables.query: What is your Azure DevOps project name?

variables.name: azurerm_backend_key
variables.description: String: Name of the tfstate file in Terraform backend state storage.
variables.query: The AzureRM backend requires a 'key' value. What is it?

variables.name: cw_environment_name
variables.description: String: Name of the folder containing Curtain Wall files.
variables.query: What is the name of the folder containing your new environment?
